CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 12, 1953, pg. 21, reads: "Howe Studio Teacher - Victor Hereford has been added to the faculty of the Howe Dance Studio at 6304 Frankstown Avenue. The talented artist has a variety of experience in dace, including a stint at the Katherine Dunham School in New York.  Mr. Hereford will instruct Afro-Cuban, ballet, tap and modern dance.
TitMainTitle: Dancer Victor Hereford posed with outstretched arms and looking right, in front of light colored background with dark parted curtains, in Harris Studio
